name: I Am Healing, Slowly
description:
This is a game created in Bitsy Game Maker in form of the hero journey by Campbell. In “I Am Healing, Slowly” the topic about hurt and forgiveness, as well as healing are confronted head on in the form of a little boy who himself became victim of deep and nasty bruises that cannot be seen right away. On his journey he tries to help others in hopes of making their lives better, but he ultimately gets hurt more than he anticipated. The issue is shown with multiplerooms that represent the hero’s journey of Beanie and how with time he slowly begins heal. 

Move with the help of arrow keys to learn more about the story of Beanie. 

(In most cases you only have to go right)
